!Warehouse Chief Reed: Greetings, traveler! I am Warehouse Chief Reed of the famous *Iron Gate Guild*. As you undoubtedly know, we are the most influential guild in the kingdom. Just look at all the banks and warehouses we operate even in the Human villages!
